Posts.Content: Mouth sores are a very common side effect of various chemotherapy drugs.   She or you can talk to her Onc's nurse and they can call in a Rx for a special mouth wash that helps a lot.  Also, check with your pharmacist.  There is also an over the counter mouthwash for chemotherapy patients called: Prevention.  It is Alcohol Free.  They have a website: www.preventionlab.com and a toll-free phone number: 1-800-473-1205.  Best of luck to your Mother and to you as well.
Posts.Title: side effects?
